DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Hematopoietic Cell Collection Outcome Death Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the donor died as a result of the product (graft) collection.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Hematopoietic Cell Collection Outcome Death
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._The result of an action_The absence of life or state of being dead.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Collection Outcome Death
Property.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The act of gathering something together.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.:The absence of life or state of being dead.

Concepts.definition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2729021
ReferenceDocuments.description: "[IF EXISTS THEN ""true"" ELSE ""false""] PerformedMedicalCondition.value(ANY=>CD).originalText (complication) WHERE PerformedMedicalCondition.value(ANY=>CD).nullFlavor = ""OTH"" (complication) AND PerformedSubstanceExtraction > DefinedProcedure (extraction surgery) > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedProcedure (overall extraction process) > DefinedCompositionRelationship > DefinedObservation (extraction monitoring) > PerformedObservation (monitoring) > PerformedMedicalCondition (complication) > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation (AE assessment) > AdverseEvent (complication AE) AND PerformedObservation (monitoring) > PerformedMedicalCondition (death) > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation (AE assessment) > AdverseEvent (death AE) > CausalAssessment > EvaluatedResultRelationship > PerformedMedicalCondition (complication)  AND EvalutedResultRelationship.probabilityCode = ""definite"""
